dcterms:description: KITTI Scene Flow dataset consists of 200 training scenes and 200 test scenes, providing ground truth scene flows obtained by lifting annotated disparity maps and optical flows to 3D.
dcterms:title: KITTI Scene Flow

dcterms:description: nuScenes is a large-scale public dataset for autonomous driving collected from 1000 real scenes, annotated with accurate 3D bounding boxes for 23 object classes.
dcterms:title: nuScenes

dcterms:creator: Xiuye Gu

dcterms:description: FlyingThings3D (FT3D) is a synthetic dataset with 19640 samples used for training scene flow estimation models.
dcterms:title: FlyingThings3D (FT3D)
